name: EverQuest: Underfoot
description: Journey into the undiscovered depths with EverQuest® Underfoot™, the sixteenth expansion of the groundbreaking EverQuest franchise. EverQuest Underfoot presents a world unlike anything you’ve experienced in Norrath, providing the ultimate MMO gaming experience for new players and veterans alike. This all-in-one compilation is the next volume of Norrathian adventure following last year’s success of EverQuest® Seeds of Destruction™. Now in its unprecedented tenth year, EverQuest takes the EQ tradition of exciting worlds, challenging dungeons, inventive new creatures and thrilling monsters underground!
